title: Riverdale's Camila Mendes dresses as a sexy Rick from Rick And Morty
text:
Camila Mendes’s Halloween costume is everything (Picture: Instagram/Adult Swim)

Riverdale’s Camila Mendes has completely nailed dressing up as Rick Sanchez from Rick And Morty this Halloween.

The 25-year-old actress channeled her inner genius scientist and made it hella sexy in the process, throwing on a baby blue bobbed wig and a chic white blazer as a lab coat.

Camila completed her look with her very own portal gun, because how would she be able to travel between dimensions without it?

She also went the extra mile and covered her chin in glitter to signify Rick’s dribble.

Sharing her incredible ensemble with her followers on Instagram, Camila captioned the snap: ‘*pickle rick voice* I’M SEXY RICKKK (and yes that’s glitter on my chin for his ~iconic~ drool).’

What a hero.

We don’t know which Rick we prefer (Picture: Adult Swim)

Unsurprisingly, fans were living for the look with Insatiable actress Debby Ryan commenting: ‘Slaps’ and Archie Comics writing: ‘Oh geez’.

We need someone to step up and be Morty though, just sayin’.

Last week, Riverdale got fans excited for their first-ever Halloween special by dropping a number of spoiler pics.

Although the episode doesn’t air until 30 October, we got a dose of all our favourite characters dressed up as superheroes.

Archie dressed up as his own superhero alter-ego, Pureheart the Powerful, while his BFF Mad Dog (aka Munroe) dressed up as The Shield, an iconic superhero from the Archie Comics.

Cheryl and Toni opted for DC Comics instead, transforming into Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn.

Rick And Morty, on the other hand, has released more details about the upcoming season four episodes ahead of next month’s release date.

Riverdale and Rick And Morty are both available to stream on Netflix.
